short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview media by hovering over its URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the "Media Previewer" Chrome extension! With this tool, you'll be able to preview images and PDF documents simply by hovering your mouse over a hyperlink. No more frustrating moments of clicking on a link and being taken to a page that you don't want. Just hover, preview, and decide whether you want to view the file or not. The preview feature works for all types of image files (JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.) and PDF documents. It's a quick and easy way to save time and streamline your browsing experience. Please note that the extension does not preview videos that are not encoded in MP4. Try it out today and see how much more efficient your web browsing can be!
